name: conker
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] mainly UK the shiny brown poisonous nut of a horse chestnut tree
MichaelJay/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages conkers [ U ] UK
a children's game in which you have a conker with a string through it and try to break another child's conker by hitting it with yours: He looked as disappointed as a small boy who's just been beaten at conkers.
